summary: Intro Replacer for the month of May.
descriptionHtml:
[center][/center][center][/center][center][u][i]Hey there,[/i][/u]
first of all, sorry for being late again!
This month's replacer was a quite time consuming one to create.
Everything goes up to 11 this time.
A fast and "action-oriented" track, with lots of badass drums^^.

[i][u]Disclaimer:[/u][/i]
I'm sure a lot of you guys are probably saying, why in the Hell would anybody want to replace Skyrim's Soundtrack!?
And you are actually 100% right. In fact i couldn't agree more.
What Jeremy Soule wrote for this Game is nothing else, but a Masterwork!
But, even the greatest Tune out there can get a bit too familiar, if you hear it a 1000 Times.
And since this Mod will only replace the Intro Song, i thought i'll give it a try.

Here is a Link to my Youtube Channel, for those who care.

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC6y_H_0vomknkEM-SbgGVOQ

As always, enjoy the game everyone. You'll hear from me.

P.S. Since some of you asked me, i will turn this Series into a mod that actually adds
   my music to the existing one, once i have writen enough. [/center]
author: Silant
